entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
